thread.title: On Tom Brady's Big Day, Gisele Bundchen Shares Adorable Photo Of Their Daughter - CBS Local
thread.title_full: On Tom Brady's Big Day, Gisele Bundchen Shares Adorable Photo Of Their Daughter - CBS Local

title: On Tom Brady's Big Day, Gisele Bundchen Shares Adorable Photo Of Their Daughter - CBS Local

organizations.name: bryan bedder/getty images for goat communications

text:
On Tom Brady’s Big Day, Gisele Bundchen Shares Adorable Photo Of Their Daughter February 5, 2017 5:27 PM Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen in April 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Bryan Bedder/Getty Images for Goat Communications) 
HOUSTON (CBS) – How cute is this? 
Gisele Bundchen is in Houston to cheer on her husband Tom Brady and the Patriots as they go for another Super Bowl ring. Before the big game, she posted a photo of their daughter in a “Brady’s Little Ladies” shirt that took social media by storm. A photo posted by Gisele Bündchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:03am PST 
The photo, captioned “#daddyslittlegirl,” has earned nearly half a million likes on Instagram in eight hours. 
A few hours later, Bundchen posted another photo of her squad in similar T-shirts. A photo posted by Gisele Bündchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 12:00pm PST 
Hopefully for the Patriots, Vivian will prove to be a good luck charm yet again. Tom Brady posted a photo of himself and his daughter before a playoff win over the Texans last month.
